alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 4:40PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Georgetown and south central Horry Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 439 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Murrells Inlet. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Garden City, Murrells Inlet, Plantersville, Burgess, Litchfield Beach and Waccamaw Community Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown
